clusters.name: Content Unavailable
clusters.description: The detailed content (title, tags, prerequisites, etc.) for the provided item IDs was not included in the input. Without this essential metadata, it is impossible to identify prerequisite chains, group items into natural thematic clusters, or propose an accurate ordered learning sequence based on content or complexity. The items are listed here as a placeholder.

items.reason: Content metadata (title, tags, prerequisites, etc.) for this item is missing from the input, preventing proper thematic clustering and sequencing.
